column4: Guys, I just got the latest cd. Does ubuntu give you a choice during installation which drive to use? (I'm a bit worried after a few things I heard)
thanks, last silly quest..does this latest release support 3com onboard network cards? Last one didn't and I had no idea what to do:)
it's a 3com chipset on an auss board. Previous ubuntu distro didn't detect it and being a beginner, I had no idea where to go from there and once in ubuntu, I could net out:):)
